title: @RIOT KATEYKHAOS Hi! my name is Zoey, and I would like to bring back the idea of project Riven.

embed.description: Have you already heard about the PROJECT:Riven skin ? I bet you did ! Here is the Final splash Art of the PROJECT:Riven skin (from MonoriRogue)...

body: Hey! I saw that you commented on that Riven thread on reddit! Battle Bunny Riven was a community created skin, why can't this one be official D:?? I love Riven so much and I really wish I had money for the soon Dragon-blade re-release (hint gimme dat skin pls omg xD jk jk).... but besides my complaining I really think this idea is amazing... Please maybe talk to another rioter about this? It would mean a lot to the community that has created this cute concept!!! Thank you and I hope you read this Katey (:!!!! Have a good day!!

replies.body:
Hi Zoey! 

I did comment on this Riven thread! I think the concept for this is pretty awesome. 

While I can't guarantee this skin will happen, I can say that this concept is something the skins team is aware of, and we've got it saved. :3

Pretty cool skin... but if you're gonna continue with the PROJECT line of skins, you gotta make her Sundowner. Or Mistral, at the very least.

Or do a PROJECT: Mundo where he's Armstrong.
